subject: [patchmanagement] KB5020276—Netjoin: Domain join hardening changes
email_text_original:
Note Microsoft will remove support for the NetJoinLegacyAccountReuse registry
setting in a future Windows update. [January 2024 - Start] This removal is
tentatively scheduled for the update dated August 13, 2024. Release dates are
subject to change. [End - January 2024] 
https://support.microsoft.com/en-au/topic/kb5020276-netjoin-domain-join-hardening-changes-2b65a0f3-1f4c-42ef-ac0f-1caaf421baf8
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fen-au%2Ftopic%2Fkb5020276-netjoin-domain-join-hardening-changes-2b65a0f3-1f4c-42ef-ac0f-1caaf421baf8&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C23ae5ae5a0654499269008dc2cf552c4%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638434679366198714%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rVH1R1HS6BxtD5VZFihqsoo7JBtLu8kVe9YlYZMJvFE%3D&reserved=0]
